text: The Kia K3 is a subcompact car made by Kia since 2023 its the sucessor of the Kia Rio. == History and Features == The Kia K3 was teased in August 2023 and in the same month it was launched in Mexico. it has a 5-door Hatchback and a 4-door Sedan versions and also 1.4 (from The Kia rio that is however retained only in export markets) 1.6 and 2.0 liter gasoline engines with 6-speed manual and automatic transmissions. == Markets == The Kia K3 is sold in Mexico where it was first released in August 2023 it is also sold in Middle East and in other Latin American countries as the K3 Cross. == References == K3 (BL7) Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Kia K3 (BL7)
